name: R5-Practitioner-R4B-Practitioner
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 Practitioner into FHIR R4B

element.display: A person with a  formal responsibility in the provisioning of healthcare or related services

target.display: A person with a  formal responsibility in the provisioning of healthcare or related services
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Practitioner`

element.display: Whether this practitioner's record is in active use

target.display: Whether this practitioner's record is in active use
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.active` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Practitioner.active`

element.display: Address(es) of the practitioner that are not role specific (typically home address)

target.display: Address(es) of the practitioner that are not role specific (typically home address)
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.address` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Practitioner.address`

element.display: The date  on which the practitioner was born

target.display: The date  on which the practitioner was born
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.birthDate` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Practitioner.birthDate`

element.display: A language which may be used to communicate with the practitioner

target.display: A language the practitioner can use in patient communication
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.communication` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `Practitioner.communication` - communication added a binding requirement - Preferred http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/languages; communication has change due to type change: R5 communication BackboneElement has no equivalent or mapped type in R4B communication

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
The language code used to communicate with the practitioner
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Language preference indicator
Contained, inline Resources

target.display: Contained, inline Resources
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Practitioner.contained`

element.display: Indicates if the practitioner is deceased or not
Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Practitioner.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

element.display: male | female | other | unknown

target.display: male | female | other | unknown
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.gender` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Practitioner.gender` - gender has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/administrative-gender|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/administrative-gender|4.3.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.display: Logical id of this artifact
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Practitioner.id`

element.display: An identifier for the person as this agent

target.display: An identifier for the person as this agent
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Practitioner.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Practitioner.implicitRules`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.display: Language of the resource content
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `Practitioner.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred

element.display: Metadata about the resource

target.display: Metadata about the resource
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Practitioner.meta`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Practitioner.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: The name(s) associated with the practitioner

target.display: The name(s) associated with the practitioner
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.name` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Practitioner.name`

element.display: Image of the person

target.display: Image of the person
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.photo` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `Practitioner.photo` - photo has change due to type change: R5 `photo` `Attachment` maps as RelatedTo for R4B `photo`

element.display: Qualifications, certifications, accreditations, licenses, training, etc. pertaining to the provision of care

target.display: Certification, licenses, or training pertaining to the provision of care
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.qualification` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Practitioner.qualification`

element.display: Coded representation of the qualification

target.display: Coded representation of the qualification
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.qualification.code` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Practitioner.qualification.code`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.qualification.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Practitioner.qualification.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.qualification.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Practitioner.qualification.id`

element.display: An identifier for this qualification for the practitioner

target.display: An identifier for this qualification for the practitioner
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.qualification.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Practitioner.qualification.identifier`

element.display: Organization that regulates and issues the qualification

target.display: Organization that regulates and issues the qualification
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.qualification.issuer` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Practitioner.qualification.issuer`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.qualification.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Practitioner.qualification.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: Period during which the qualification is valid

target.display: Period during which the qualification is valid
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.qualification.period` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Practitioner.qualification.period`

element.display: A contact detail for the practitioner (that apply to all roles)

target.display: A contact detail for the practitioner (that apply to all roles)
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.telecom` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Practitioner.telecom`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `Practitioner.text` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Practitioner.text`
